title: Ep 241 | How Phil Fixed His Hip, Going Shady Places & No, We Are Not Under the Ten Commandments
description:
Phil managed to become a star football player with one leg shorter than the other, but all it took to fix the problem was five bucks. Jase takes issue with the widespread Christian belief that we're still under the Ten Commandments. If you've wondered what it really means when he says there are no rules, this is the episode for you. The guys also discuss whether it's sinful to skip church meetings, go shady places, and hang around with shady people. And Phil shares what the Bible has to say about keeping things simple.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
